title: Zhen Dao Ge: Chenshi Hang

synonyms: Zhen Dao Ge: Chen Shi Xing
alternative_titles.en: On The Edge: Journey into the Mortal World

synopsis:
It revolves around the treacherous struggles between various martial arts sects in Linqing, Shandong. The protagonist, Luo Tong, the young master of the Canal Gang, becomes embroiled in a conspiracy against the gang. Facing the impending annihilation of the gang and the pursuit of numerous other martial arts sects, Luo Tong, with the help of his childhood sweetheart Hong Niang, the master craftsman Jiang Yuan, and the impetuous hero Long Shun, gradually approaches the truth. Each character holds onto their own beliefs and convictions, leading to a series of exhilarating and thrilling battles…

(Source: Tencent, translated)
